4

A_Leaf River Cluster Development - SIP Panel Condominium Project
● Workforce housing - Also excellent market
● Should sell out quickly if well-made and attractive
Condominium Structure Benefits
● Financing flexibility - Doesn't have to look like condos, just be condos legally
● Market validation - Deposits held in escrow until financing secured
● Downside protection - Can't pull bank loan until other conditions met
● Individual ownership - Appeals to various investor types

Postscript: Industry Comparison
For reference, typical residential development projects generate 15-25% profit margins with
developer fees of 8-12% of total development costs. This project's 32.7% net margin after our
reduced 3% fee structure represents exceptional returns compared to standard residential
development economics. The combination of construction innovation, strong market
fundamentals, and reduced fee structure creates unusually attractive owner economics.
